item.title: Ready? Go
item.author: mail@azriel.im (Azriel Hoh)
item.description: Hiya, it’s Azriel. I enjoy creating things, whether it’s writing programs or making cards. I have always wanted to make a game, especially since I discovered and learnt how to modify Little Fighter 2. This was one of my favourite high school pastimes. In February 2018, I began to work on this full time.
